page.title: 08HAREWOOD:MUSICAL EVENINGS
page.content:
The musical evenings started at Harewood House in 1968. 5 concerts are held each year,commencing in November. They take place in the Gallery.The Earl attends every performance.
Tickets cost about Â£8.The price includes a seat and a break with tea, coffee and biscuits, besides two and a half hours of music.About 180 people normally attend.
The music is always classical, chosen by the Earl and the performer. The musician would arrive at lunch time on the day of the concert and rehearse in the afternoon.
